## ColorMapLegend.setInverted() method

Set wheter the direction of the legend should be MAX -<!-- -->&gt; MIN

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setInverted(inverted: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  inverted | boolean | Invert the legend direction |

void
